title: i got tricked by riot
body: im in my promos to bronze 3 and im in queue for the last match to see if i go on or stay in bronze 4 , i got in champ select and when the teams picked there champs and the game's about to be ready to load the game crashed and i closed client and no matter what i did to log back in i couldn't log in, and after the game have long been remaked i got to log back in only to see i'v  been banned for 5 games, thank you riot for making me hate this game a little bit more. and my internet is fine, so fix your shit.

replies.body: It sucks that the client crashed during your promos, and I'd like to help troubleshoot this so it doesn't happen again.  Crashing during champion select is usually caused by either connection problems, or using third party programs that don't play well with league.  If you have any running like play.tv, overwolf, lolrecorder, etc, remove it for the fix.  If you still have any trouble, let me know with more details like any error messages you might be getting.  I'll be around!
